column3:
Is the options shortcut a cross platform thing?
IIRC macOS uses `CMD+,`

NACK about the Command line Options, I think F1 would fit better

> Is the options shortcut a cross platform thing?

Yes, it is.
@GChuf Take a look at Atom, you open the Settings there with `CTRL-,`
Unsure about that.\nAt least on macOS, there is already a default shortcut for options.\nWould someone really make use of a shortcut for the command line options?
Regarding options, I could make this shortcut available only to non-macOS systems.\nAnd as for command line options, I think someone might use it. I don't think it hurts adding it.
